short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GoodVibes NewTab allows you to make an impact right from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spread the Good Vibes with the GoodVibes NewTab extension for Chrome. Elevate your browsing experience and make a positive impact effortlessly. This innovative new tab page empowers you to contribute to charitable causes while enjoying a customized browsing environment. Easily search the web, access your favorite sites, and discover stunning backgrounds, all while supporting NGOs. Join the movement and turn your everyday browsing into meaningful action.
